description: [OceanSalt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0346) can extract drive information from the endpoint and search files on the system.(Citation: McAfee Oceansalt Oct 2018)

external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R., Malhotra, A. (2018, October 18). ‘Operation Oceansalt’ Attacks South Korea, U.S., and Canada With Source Code From Chinese Hacker Group. Retrieved November 30, 2018.
